errors.error_description: The installation instructions incorrectly list running migrations (`python manage.py migrate`) before installing the package (`pip install dj-stripe`). The package must be installed before its models can be migrated.
correction_candidates: Swap the order of the `pip install dj-stripe` and `python manage.py migrate` commands.
Combine the commands into `pip install dj-stripe && python manage.py migrate`.
Change `python manage.py migrate` to `python manage.py makemigrations djstripe`.
errors.golden_answer: Swap the order of the `pip install dj-stripe` and `python manage.py migrate` commands.
